org.spongepowered.api.event.block

Interface BlockRedstoneUpdateEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, BlockUpdateEvent, CauseTracked, Event, GameEvent

    public interface BlockRedstoneUpdateEvent
extends BlockUpdateEvent
    Called when the redstone signal of a block is updated.

    Note: This event should be called for all blocks, regardless of their ability to conduct redstone. This event should occur for redstone wire, as well as stone, dirt, pumpkins, and cake.
